headline: Full List of 17 Lawmakers Who Voted Against Russian Oil Ban
author: Darragh Roche
sentences: The Republicans voting against the energy ban were Andy Biggs of Arizona, Dan Bishop of North Carolina, Lauren Boebert of Colorado, Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina, Scott DesJarlais of Tennessee, Matt Gaetz of Florida, Louie Gohmert of Texas, Paul Gosar of Arizona, Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia, Glenn Grothman of Wisconsin, Clay Higgins of Louisiana, Bill Posey of Florida, Chip Roy of Texas and Tom Tiffany of Wisconsin.

Representative Omar said she would vote against the bill in an interview on Tuesday, saying that lawmakers needed to "think about what this means a year from now, what this means two years, three years from now."

The legislation is separate from the Biden administration's ban on Russian energy imports and Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi decided to proceed with a vote on the bill despite Biden's action.
